title: transform
description: Full spatial transform of a scene object, including position, rotation, and scale. Used for non-bone, virtual, or environmental objects.

position.description: 3D position vector (metres) in the reference coordinate system.

rotation.description: Orientation as a unit quaternion (x, y, z, w).

scale.description: Scale factor for each axis. (1,1,1) = unscaled.

space.description: Reference coordinate space (e.g., world, local, stage, display).
